page.title: 18GUIDES' 75th ANNIVERSARY
page.content: The Guides started 75years ago and now in 1985 every Guide in the world is celebrating the{75th}birthday. Several activities will be taking place. One of these activities is a Candlelight Ceremony. Every Guide will have a candle and so will the Guide Leaders. The County Commisioners will have their candles lit by Guide Leaders even higher up and they will light all the Guides in the worlds candles. At the ceremony there will be a'Penny Fayre' where lots of games are played and you pay a penny to play them. Every Guide Company in the world, will be having a Birthday Party. At the parties the Guides and Brownies will be entertaining Parents and Friends.
